tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_schedules (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  certification TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AdventureTourGuides (
    guide_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    certification_status BOOLEAN,
    certification_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeSchedules (
    schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    guide_id UUID REFERENCES AdventureTourGuides(guide_id),
    shift_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE TourSchedules (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_date DATE NOT NULL,
  tour_location VARCHAR(100),
  guide_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (guide_id) REFERENCES AdventureTourGuides(guide_id)
);

CREATE TABLE GuideCertifications (
  guide_id INT,
  certification_id INT,
  certification_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY(guide_id, certification_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (guide_id) REFERENCES AdventureTourGuides(guide_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES Certifications(certification_id)
);

CREATE TABLE adventure_tour_guides (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone VARCHAR(15),
    certification_status BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tour_guide_id INT,
    date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);
